FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn interface performance command displays PW traffic statistics on a time division multiplexing (TDM) interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vpn interface serial1/0/0 performance
Number of times the jitter buffer was overrun  : 1
Number of times the jitter buffer was underrun : 5
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To learn traffic statistics about a PW whose encapsulation type is TDM on the AC side, run the display mpls l2vpn interface performance command.
Prerequisites
A PW has been configured on a TDM interface on which you want to query PW traffic statistics.
Precautions
the interface ifType ifNumber parameter must specify an AC interface to which a pw connects.This command can display only statistics of a primary PW.
